description:
Cut from a stylish herringbone material, these light and stretchy pants will keep you looking good while on the go. The Aphrodite 2.0 pants combine their stretchy material with ergonomic pattering to offer you complete freedom of movement, keeping you comfy in the frontcountry and the backcountry.

  • Lightweight recycled nylon blend has an easy 4-way stretch and FlashDry™ for improved wicking and reduced drying times
  • PFC-free DWR finish helps keep you dry during unexpected showers and keeps them looking cleaner longer
  • UPF 40 blocks more than 95% of harsh UV
  • Elastic encased waistband and an internal drawcord let you customize the fit
  • Plenty of pocket space for sightseeing essentials, and an internal zippered pocket help small items secure
  • Contoured patterning helps these stretch and move with you
name: The North Face Aphrodite 2.0 Pant - Women's
